DOC.brief_summary: This study is a pilot, ascending dose, multi-center, randomized, double blind, placebo controlled, pediatric study conducted in three phases.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Two Doses of Rilonacept in Pediatric Subjects With Active Systemic Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis (SJIA)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include, but are not limited to, the following: Patients aged 4 to less than 21 years who meet the criteria for active SJIA Must have been on a stable dose of nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) for at least 4 weeks prior to the screening visit Exclusion Criteria include, but are not limited to, the following: Use of certain medications prior to the baseline visit History of recurrent infections
